description:
AtPac Services

NOW HIRING

Truck Unloaders Needed at our Chino, CA Warehouse Facilities!!

  • COMPANY BUS TRANSPORTATION PROVIDED AT DESIGNATED APPLE VALLEY PICK UP LOCATION


1st and 2nd Shift Available

Monday-Friday Operations

Production Pay: Can make $120-150 per day on average

Job Details:

As an Unloader, you will be responsible for unloading shipping containers and unloading trailers for warehouse storage. Responsibilities will include accurately separating cases and placing them on pallets for all inbound freight. You will also ensure that all products are free of damage and that production code dates are visible for warehouse storage. If you take pride in providing superior warehouse services and enjoy the benefits of performance-driven results, apply and join our team today!

Primary Duties:

  • Assist shipping and receiving, unloading trucks and checking in merchandise
  • Processing requests and supply orders; pulling materials, sorting materials, packing boxes
  • Maintains safe and clean work environment by keeping shelves, pallet area, and work stations neat


Required:

  • Regularly lift and/or move objects 10-50lbs, occasionally heavier lifting is also required.
  • Must be 18+ for consideration!
